    • addDPMAffectedDates

      public void addDPMAffectedDates(String discountName, ArrayList<Integer> affectedDates, float modifiedRate)
      Adds affected dates and their corresponding modified rates to the discount data. This method updates the modified rate for each affected date and records the discount name.
      Parameters:
      discountName - the name of the discount to be associated with the affected dates
      affectedDates - an ArrayList of integers representing the dates affected by the discount
      modifiedRate - the rate to be applied to the affected dates

    • getDatePriceModifier

      public DatePriceModifier getDatePriceModifier()
      Returns the Date Price Modifier object of the Hotel.
      Returns:
      the DPM object
